data:
## function_Alert
> **Alert**(`props`): `Element`


Alert component that uses a forward ref to expose an API.

This component utilizes the [useWidget](../config#usewidget) hook to create an alert widget context
and the [useImperativeHandle](https://react.dev/reference/react/useImperativeHandle) hook to expose the widget's API via the ref.

### Parameters

#### props

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`AlertProps`](#alertprops)\> & `object`

Partial properties of the AlertProps interface.

### Returns

`Element`

A JSX element that conditionally renders the AlertElement based on the widget's hidden state.

## interface_AlertApi

Represents the API for an alert component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>


Triggers alert closing programmatically (same as clicking on the close button (×)).

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>


Triggers the alert to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`void`\>

## interface_AlertContext

Represents the context for an Alert component.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: [`AlertApi`](#alertapi)


all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`AlertDirectives`](#alertdirectives)


directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`AlertState`](#alertstate)


the state of the widget

## function_AlertDefaultSlotStructure
> **AlertDefaultSlotStructure**(`slotContext`): `Element`


Renders the default slot structure for an alert component.

### Parameters

#### slotContext

[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)

The context object containing state and API for the alert.

### Returns

`Element`

A JSX element representing the alert's body and an optional close button.

## interface_AlertDirectives

Represents the directives for an alert component.

### Properties

#### transitionDirective

> **transitionDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)


the transition directive, piloting what is the visual effect of going from hidden to visible

## interface_AlertProps

Represents the properties for the Alert component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`


If `true`, alert closing will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when clicked on the close button (×),
via the `.close()` function or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`


If `true`, alert opening will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when the `.open()` function is called
or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>


Template for the alert content

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`


If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`


Callback called when the alert is hidden.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`


Callback called when the alert is shown.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`


Callback called when the alert visibility changed.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>


Global template for the alert component

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)


The transition function will be executed when the alert is displayed or hidden.

Depending on the value of `animatedOnInit`, the animation can be optionally skipped during the showing process.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### type

> **type**: [`BSContextualClass`](../types#bscontextualclass)


Type of the alert, following bootstrap types.

##### Default Value

`'primary'`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## interface_AlertState

Represents the state of an alert component.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`


Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>


Template for the alert content

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`


CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`


If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`


Is `true` when the alert is hidden. Compared to `visible`, this is updated after the transition is executed.

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`AlertContext`](#alertcontext)\>


Global template for the alert component

***

#### type

> **type**: [`BSContextualClass`](../types#bscontextualclass)


Type of the alert, following bootstrap types.

##### Default Value

`'primary'`

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`


If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## type alias_AlertWidget
> **AlertWidget** = [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`AlertProps`](#alertprops), [`AlertState`](#alertstate), [`AlertApi`](#alertapi), [`AlertDirectives`](#alertdirectives)\>


Represents an alert widget component.

## constant_createAlert
> `const` **createAlert**: [`WidgetFactory`](../types#widgetfactory)\<[`AlertWidget`](#alertwidget)\>


Create an AlertWidget with given config props

### Param

an optional alert config

### Returns

an AlertWidget

## constant_getAlertDefaultConfig
> `const` **getAlertDefaultConfig**: () => [`AlertProps`](#alertprops)


Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Alert config

### Returns

[`AlertProps`](#alertprops)

the default Alert config
